title: Blacklisting all DJ Sona owners. Post here.
body:
Anyone who spends money on a free game is an idiot. ESPECIALLY ON DJ SONA. I've already gone and deleted everyone who had the DJ Sona icon on my buddy list and I thought it be best I also blacklist people here on the forums in FEK who have it as well and I've already blacklisted some people caught displaying those avatars of it, but I doubt that was all of you as an idiot is born every second. (I forget the saying.)

Reveal yourselves, owners of DJ Sona.
